title: Miracles and Demons - Best of Coast to Coast AM 8/23/21
itunes:title: Miracles and Demons - Best of Coast to Coast AM 8/23/21
description:
George Noory and Professor Adam Blai explore his work training Catholic priests to be exorcists to drive away demons, the three different types of miracles, and if prayer determines whether or not a miracle will happen.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
